title: Software Developer
description: At Hiper, I'm working as a part of an agile development team with 11 members. I primarily develop features for their CRM backend system but also contribute to the client UI. We follow Scrum methodologies and use tools like PHP, Symfony, Sass, PostgreSQL, Docker, and Ubuntu.

title: Full-Stack Web Developer
description: As a full-stack developer at Tales, I was responsible for creating APIs, fetching data from 3rd party collaborators, managing server-database communication, UI design, and working in an agile Scrum environment. The main technologies I used were PHP, MySQL, Vue, JavaScript, Sass, and HTML.

title: Study Employee
description: During my time at Holder 100, I built websites for clients using WordPress, PHP, and MySQL. For my bachelor project, I developed a SPA with React, PHP, and MySQL to facilitate file and task sharing between Holder 100 and its customers. The final project is live at mit.holder100.dk.

title: Study Employee
description: Supeo hired me and two fellow students for an internship and a part-time student job. We developed websites for clients using React, Vue, PHP, Laravel, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, and GraphQL.
